function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of statistical analysis provided for the outcome of the distance violation index","Impact":"Inability to assess the effectiveness of the social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Conduct statistical analysis to validate the effectiveness of the social distancing measures","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data visualization tools","People":"General population, stakeholders responsible for implementing social distancing measures","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"},{"Description":"No statistical assessment on virus spread based on distance measurements","Impact":"Inability to understand the potential impact of the distance measurement on virus spread","Mitigation":"Perform statistical assessment on the correlation between distance violations and virus spread","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, epidemiological modeling","People":"General population, stakeholders responsible for public health measures","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate comparison of DNN models' accuracy based on non-comparable ground truths","Impact":"Misleading evaluation of the effectiveness of DNN models for object detection","Mitigation":"Use standardized and comparable datasets with ground truth annotations for accurate evaluation","Technologies":"Standardized datasets, ground truth annotation tools","People":"Research community, stakeholders in object detection technology","Owner":"Research team, technology standards organizations"}]}
